script:
#!/bin/sh

export PATH=/usr/local/bin:/usr/local/opt/ruby/bin:/usr/local/opt/openssl/bin:/usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/2.6.0/bin:$PATH

if [ $NOVA_TASK_NAME == "build" ]; then
	jekyll build
fi

if [ $NOVA_TASK_NAME == "run" ]; then
	jekyll serve
fi

if [ $NOVA_TASK_NAME == "clean" ]; then
	jekyll clean
fi
